name: Intuition Publishing
description: Intuition is a leading global knowledge solutions company. With offices located worldwide, we have developed and deployed our award-winning products and services to many of the world’s leading corporate and public sector organizations for over 35 years. We help your business use knowledge effectively. Our products engage, motivate, and inspire your employees on their learning paths. By committing to the highest standards in our products and services, we deliver solutions that help achieve and exceed your company goals.
